org.digidoc4j

Interface SignatureToken

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Signer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExternalSigner, PKCS11SignatureToken, PKCS12SignatureToken, PKCS12Signer

    public interface SignatureToken
    Signing interface.

    • Method Summary

      X509Certificate getCertificate()
      Returns signer certificate
